Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1967...
Earned first career win on 4/3/1969...
Injured on 7/7/1969 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 7-8 weeks...
Traded from Cleveland to Detroit on 1/31/1971 (Going to DET: RF L. Reams, P G. Gentry, 1B L. Stanton, P J. Niekro, 3B B. Robinson. Going to CLE: 1B H. Killebrew, P D. Drysdale)...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 2/6/1979 to a 3-year deal worth $4,900,001 per year...
